#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<math.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int nm[101]={0};
int dm[101]={0};
long long  gcd ( long long a, long long b )
{
  long long c;
  while ( a != 0 ) {
     c = a; a = b%a;  b = c;
  }
  return b;
}
int main()
{
    int n,i,nu,de,t;

    scanf("%d",&t);

    for(i=1;i<=t;i++)
    {
        scanf("%d",&nm[i]);
        scanf("%d",&dm[i]);
    }

    long long hcf=0,lcm=1;
    for(i=1;i<=t;i++)
    {
        hcf=gcd(hcf,nm[i]);
        lcm=(lcm*dm[i])/gcd(lcm,dm[i]);
    }
    printf("%d",hcf);
    printf("%c",'/');
    printf("%d",lcm);



return 0;
}
